author: aniketkhanal
body: This is a backport of [#44754](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44754) and [#44926 ](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44926) (the latter fixes some relval issues created by #44754 ). We are backporting these changes for the current data taking.
title: [14_0_X] Adding PNET scores to offline HLT DQM
